DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate ability gonadotropin release hormone ( GnRh ) agonist prevent rise progesterone control ovarian stimulation vitro fertilization ( IVF ) administration human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( hCG ) first day menses .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Luteolytic Effect Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Agonist After Administration Human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( hCG ) Initial Follicular Phase Its Influence Prognosis Vitro Fertilization Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate efficacy GnRH agonist prevent functional rescue corpus luteum woman submit controlled ovarian stimulation administration hCG first day menses evaluate effect pregnancy rate ovarian steroidogenesis .
DOC.criteria: age > 21 < 38 year old polycystic ovarian syndrome risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome recurrent abortion endometriosis 3 IVF failure use oral contraceptive pill precede 3 month low response gonadotropin
